description: Tadipatri Engineering College (TEC) has all the facilities to provide the best education system in the engineering stream. Not only that, TEC has well-experienced faculty that provides pragmatic & informative solutions to its students. Also, it has several distinct features for its students, which eventually make them future-ready and professional all at the same time.

faqs.question: How is the faculty of Tadipatri Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Faculty at TEC provides all the requisite help to the students whenever they need any guidance or assistance. Not only that, students will get the exposure of practical learning as well.

faqs.question: Will I get a placement opportunity after completing my education at this college?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, training and placement opportunities are available at TEC. Every student needs to be more aware of their chosen field.

faqs.question: How is the infrastructure of this college?
faqs.answer: Ans.At TEC, students get free Wi-Fi, a digital library, smart classrooms, sports competitions, etc. to make infrastructure facilities for its students more unique.

faqs.question: Does the college provide scholarship opportunities to its students?
faqs.answer: Ans.TEC doesn’t provide any scholarships to its students but students can apply for state-level scholarships to fund their education.

Section.name: About TEC
Section.description:
Situated in Anantapur, Tadipatri Engineering College (TEC) is a private institution, established in 2010. Affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad, the college offers B.Tech, M.Tech, and diploma courses across various specializations, such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical, and Electronics Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering, etc.
Candidates’ seeking admission into its B.Tech courses must have passed 10+2 from science stream with a minimum of 50% marks as an aggregate, candidates seeking admission into M.Tech course should have completed B.Tech/B.E. degree from a recognized board, and candidates seeking admission into the diploma courses should have passed 10th with a minimum of 33% as an aggregate.
70% of the seats are filled on the basis of the scores secured by the candidate in the entrance examination and the remaining 30% seats are filled through management quota.
Read More: Tadipatri Engineering College Reviews
Tadipatri Engineering College (TEC) has all the facilities to provide the best education system in the engineering stream. Not only that, TEC has well-experienced faculty that provides pragmatic & informative solutions to its students. Also, it has several distinct features for its students, which eventually make them future-ready and professional all at the same time.
All the admission seekers must follow the requisite guidelines that the college will present while filling up the admission form.

Ques. How is the faculty of Tadipatri Engineering College?
Ans. Faculty at TEC provides all the requisite help to the students whenever they need any guidance or assistance. Not only that, students will get the exposure of practical learning as well.
Ques. Will I get a placement opportunity after completing my education at this college?
Ans. Yes, training and placement opportunities are available at TEC. Every student needs to be more aware of their chosen field.
Ques. How is the infrastructure of this college?
Ans. At TEC, students get free Wi-Fi, a digital library, smart classrooms, sports competitions, etc. to make infrastructure facilities for its students more unique.
Ques. Does the college provide scholarship opportunities to its students?
Ans. TEC doesn’t provide any scholarships to its students but students can apply for state-level scholarships to fund their education.
